title: Property Walkthrough for Optimo Loan
description: Guided walkthrough to capture all required property photos for loan approval

locations.name: House Name Plate
locations.verificationGuidelines: Capture a clear, legible image of the house name plate or number. Ensure the address is fully visible and matches the loan application details.

locations.name: Main Entrance & Facade
locations.verificationGuidelines: Photograph the main entrance with the door clearly visible. Include part of the facade to show the general condition of the property exterior. Door should be centered in the frame.

locations.name: Living Room/Hall
locations.verificationGuidelines: Capture the full living space including seating area, windows, and any entertainment units. Ensure good lighting and minimal personal items.

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.verificationGuidelines: Show the entire kitchen with clear visibility of countertops, appliances, and sink. Make sure lighting is adequate and there's no clutter visible.

locations.name: Bedroom - All
locations.verificationGuidelines: Take photos of all bedrooms in the property. Each bedroom should show the bed area, windows, and storage space. Capture from a corner angle to maximize visibility of the space.

locations.name: Rear Door
locations.verificationGuidelines: If the property has a rear exit, photograph the door from the inside showing the locking mechanism and overall condition.

locations.name: Store Room
locations.verificationGuidelines: If present, capture the storage room showing its size and condition. Try to show the entire space in a single shot if possible.

locations.name: Dining Area
locations.verificationGuidelines: If separate from the living room, photograph the dining area showing the table and chairs. Capture the entire space to demonstrate its size and condition.

locations.name: Passage/Corridor Area
locations.verificationGuidelines: If applicable, capture the corridors connecting different areas of the house. Show the full length where possible to verify connectivity between spaces.

locations.name: Staircase
locations.verificationGuidelines: If present, photograph the staircase showing both the steps and handrail. Take the photo from the bottom looking up to capture the entire structure.

locations.name: Terrace
locations.verificationGuidelines: If available, capture the terrace area showing its size, condition, and any protective barriers. Include views of surrounding areas if relevant.

locations.name: Balcony
locations.verificationGuidelines: If present, photograph any balconies showing the flooring, railings, and doors leading to them. Capture enough of the exterior view to verify location.

locations.name: Verandah/Porch
locations.verificationGuidelines: If applicable, capture the verandah or porch area showing its size and condition. Include any seating or decorative elements to demonstrate usability.

locations.name: Garden Area
locations.verificationGuidelines: If present, photograph the garden showing its size, landscaping, and maintenance condition. Capture from multiple angles if it's a large area.

locations.name: Vehicle Garage/Parking
locations.verificationGuidelines: If available, photograph the garage or designated parking space. Show the full capacity and any security features such as gates or covers.

locations.name: Overhead Tank
locations.verificationGuidelines: Capture clear images of the overhead water tank showing its size, condition, and installation. If possible, show the plumbing connections.

locations.name: Lift
locations.verificationGuidelines: If the building has an elevator, photograph both the exterior doors and interior cabin. Verify it's in working condition if possible.
